snippet: In a civil rights lawsuit, the Justice Department also accused Joe Arpaio, sheriff of Maricopa County, Arizona, of retaliating against critics.
abstract: Justice Department files civil rights lawsuit against Sheriff Joe Arpaio of Maricopa County, Ariz, who has waged a relentless crackdown on illegal immigrants; suit alleges that police under Arpaio's command were five to nine times as likely to stop and search a Latino person than a non-Latino.

byline.original: By FERNANDA SANTOS and CHARLIE SAVAGE
byline.contributor: Fernanda Santos reported from Phoenix, and Charlie Savage from Washington.

lead_paragraph: In a civil rights lawsuit, the Justice Department also accused Joe Arpaio, sheriff of Maricopa County, Arizona, of retaliating against critics.

headline.seo: Justice Department Sues Arizona Sheriff Joe Arpaio
headline.main: Lawsuit Says Sheriff Discriminated Against Latinos
headline.print_headline: U.S. Suit Says Arizona Sheriff Discriminated Against Latinos
